home.branchDesc:
To make it easier to develop and update merges, we simplified the main branch code by retaining only the home menu. 
The rest of the content has been moved to the example branch for maintenance. 
The preview displays the contents of the sample branch.
home.greeting: Hello {userName}, a new day full of energy begins!

projectNews.desc1: Soybean created the soybean-admin open source project on May 28, 2021!
projectNews.desc2: Yanbowe reported a bug in soybean-admin regarding the adaptation of the multi-tab bar.
projectNews.desc3: Soybean is actively preparing the release of soybean-admin!
projectNews.desc4: Soybean is working on the documentation for the soybean-admin project!
projectNews.desc5: Soybean just created a few dashboard pages, and it's already impressive!
projectNews.title: Project News

home.weatherDesc: Today, variable weather with sunny spells, 20℃ - 25℃!
